result.execSummary:
The defendant Scott M Stewart was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse, Domestic Abuse - Infliction of Physical Pain or Injury, Domestic Abuse Assessments], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: No jail credit.  If probation becomes revoked, the sentence may be served with huber.

miscConds.notes: Court orders the $150 cash bond on file be applied to the court costs.
Domestic Violence Counseling and any follow-up.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

chargeModifiers.descr: Domestic Abuse - Infliction of Physical Pain or Injury

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Scott M Stewart

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Probation review hearing on June 6, 2016 at 01:00 pm.

records.descr: Notice of court ordered financial obligations

records.addlTxt:
9:57 a.m.  Defendant present in court without counsel.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Statement by defendant - will not be getting an attorney and will represent himself.  Court goes over right to counsel.  Defendant waives right to counsel.  Court accepts waiver.  Statement by DA, an agreement has been reached.  DA recites agreement - defendant will plea to the charge.  Defendant concurs.

Court goes over constitutional rights with the defendant - defendant waives these rights.  Court goes over the elements of each offense.  Court instructs defendant of the maximum penalty and as domestic.  Court instructs defendant regarding deportation.

Defendant enters a plea of NO CONTEST.  Court finds the plea is made freely, voluntarily, intelligently and understandingly.  Court finds there is a factual basis to support the plea.  Court finds the defendant guilty on count 1 as charged.  Court orders the judgment of conviction be entered here today.  DA confirms compliance with victim witness rights.  Sentencing statement by DA.  No statement by the defendant.

Court sentences the defendant to:  30 days county jail (with huber if served), stayed and places the defendant on probation for 1 year.

CONDITIONS:

Domestic Violence Counseling
Court costs & domestic abuse assessment.

Court orders the cash bond on file be applied to the court costs.
No jail credit.

Court adjourned at 10:04 p.m.
No violent contact with Brittany B.
No violent contact with Brittany B.

1:33 p.m.  Defendant present in court without counsel.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant confirms receipt of the criminal complaint and waives reading.  Court instructs the defendant of the maximum penalty on each count.  Court finds probable cause.  Court instructs the defendant of his right to an attorney.  Defendant enters a plea of NOT GUILTY.  DA makes bond recommendation.  Court sets bond at $150.00 cash bond and conditions of:  No violent contact with Brittany B.  Court will set for Status Hearing on July 14, 2015 at 9:30 a.m.

Court adjourned at 1:35 p.m.
